name: NFCTypeNameFormat
desc: The Type Name Format values that specify the content type for the payload data in an NFC NDEF message.

items.name: case absoluteURI
items.desc: A type indicating that the payload contains a uniform resource identifier.

items.name: case empty
items.desc: A type indicating that the payload contains no data.

items.name: case media
items.desc: A type indicating that the payload contains media data as defined by RFC 2046.

items.name: case nfcExternal
items.desc: A type indicating that the payload contains NFC external type data.

items.name: case nfcWellKnown
items.desc: A type indicating that the payload contains well-known NFC record type data.

items.name: case unchanged
items.desc: A type indicating that the payload is part of a series of records containing chunked data.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: A type indicating that the payload data type is unknown.
